QuestData.Title: Delegation
QuestData.Description: I am duty-bound to look into your claims immediately, $r, which means my mission here now must fall to you.$b$bA surge of ancient magic, far too strong to have occurred naturally, drew me here. I have since discovered a most troubling development.$b$bA bough from Nordrassil has been ripped from the tree and taken deep into the Firelands. There, a powerful ritual threatens to corrupt Nordrassil, consuming it in flame.$b$bYou must find a way to interrupt the ritual and reclaim the World Tree's branch.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Branch of Nordrassil from the Firelands.
